item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Rsclassic2013, post:40, topic:524495”][quote author=imthenull link=topic=643045.msg4333002#msg4333002 date=1373928262]

Matt just ignore code of fame…all he ever does just talk…Like it’s my idea to twist my server into custom server but code of fame said I’m dumb for not keeping it the same. I really want to see him open up his own server and prove his sorry ass he is better than us. Anyways keep up the good work on your server…
[/quote]Well for one, he can certainly construct a proper sentence, unlike you.

Oh I can construct a proper sentence. I just don’t want to show off. Real people don’t sit behind a computer talking smack about other people.[/quote]I highly doubt that you can construct a proper sentence.

item.title: Delete all of this please and thank you
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“bubsky, post:29, topic:524495”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=643045.msg4330611#msg4330611 date=1373590043]

[quote author=The_Boss link=topic=643045.msg4330581#msg4330581 date=1373585997]

I have nothing against people learning. But sorry, I don’t think someone that inexperienced should try to run a server. CFF already posted enough reasons why

don’t be scared tigerclan that it might be better than your deathscape server. Which by the way i was informed that server was basically given to you(code and content in it), so with that said you do not have much room to talk.[quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=643045.msg4330004#msg4330004 date=1373506693]

Yea. We need to learn if we don’t know how to do so, at least he is trying. Don’t be too mean,dude. Give him a chance, and let’s us see his ser
[/quote]He can’t even do the most basic things imaginable, how can you expect him to fix a bug, add new content, or even secure his player’s passwords?

at cff, i have had 3-5 servers that were out with the longest one being up for over a year i believe it was. and same goes to you as you don’t have much room to talk because i don’t see you ever come out with a server all you do is try to make yourself feel good by putting others down-- dont believe me then people can check your latest posts.

Im going to put a server out as no one else is… im done talking to tigerclan && cff (you negative bitches) cause you both are a waste of my positive energy.
[/quote]Having servers before, or for some length of time doesn’t mean you’re competent enough to run one… It merely means you can successfully download something and run it.

The reason I’ve never run my own server is not because I’m incapable, it’s because I choose not to.

Also, what kind of delusion are you living in that I need to come out with a server to understand what skills someone needs to run and maintain a server? In case you haven’t noticed, I’m one of the project ‘leaders’ and biggest contributer for MoparClassic, which is a server that you can’t even figure out how to get working properly.

Furthermore, your reasoning for why I post is completely wrong. I posted, in this thread, because you shouldn’t be running a server; it’s unethical for someone as incompetent as you to run one.

Anyway, why don’t you address the point I made, rather than personally attacking me and using logical fallacies.

That is doing real well btw.
[/quote]What? You going to need to be more specific… You’ve quoted a relatively large post with many points, and made a comment that has absolutely no hint as to what you’re referencing.

Shut the love up fame, all you’ve done here is negatively reflect anyone who has anything to do with running a private rsc server project. Your own lack of self esteem towards someone who is trying to help everyone else out, if they’re looking for a server similar to something of this nature, is reflected poorly upon you if someone smart were to take the time to realize. If you think their passwords are susceptible to hacking then maybe warning them of the instance, instead of flaming the OP server admin, would probably be the more mature course of action. Anyone even considering this server has a lack of what this man has to offer them. You might go far some day if you notice your own ignorance in the course of your accusations. Just be aware, for future reference, you might be able to code a server of a dying game, you might even be able to brag about it to everyone who has no idea, but in the end you’re still just a nobody talking about nothing anyone cares about so much to even quote you at the dinner table to themselves.

On Topic: I think this idea has been stretched out a thousand times, by people more capable than yourself, Matt. Maybe by condensing your own skill set with others and to maybe sacrifice more than you’re willing to do so, you can probably find a solution to “our” dying rsc private server situation. Not to say that you aren’t trying, but i think it’s going to take more than what you’re offering as a supplementary solution to the needs of the few who actually give a love.

Good luck tho.[/quote]It’s funny how you don’t even know how to use half the words in your post, let alone what they mean. Not a single sentence in your first paragraph makes any sense.

Read full topic
item.source: Delete all of this please and thank you

item.title: Delete all of this please and thank you
item.dc:creator: @bubsky bubsky
item.description:
@bubsky wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:27, topic:524495”][quote author=The_Boss link=topic=643045.msg4330581#msg4330581 date=1373585997]

[quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=643045.msg4330074#msg4330074 date=1373516863]

I have nothing against people learning. But sorry, I don’t think someone that inexperienced should try to run a server. CFF already posted enough reasons why

don’t be scared tigerclan that it might be better than your deathscape server. Which by the way i was informed that server was basically given to you(code and content in it), so with that said you do not have much room to talk.[quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=643045.msg4330004#msg4330004 date=1373506693]

Yea. We need to learn if we don’t know how to do so, at least he is trying. Don’t be too mean,dude. Give him a chance, and let’s us see his ser
[/quote]He can’t even do the most basic things imaginable, how can you expect him to fix a bug, add new content, or even secure his player’s passwords?

at cff, i have had 3-5 servers that were out with the longest one being up for over a year i believe it was. and same goes to you as you don’t have much room to talk because i don’t see you ever come out with a server all you do is try to make yourself feel good by putting others down-- dont believe me then people can check your latest posts.

Im going to put a server out as no one else is… im done talking to tigerclan && cff (you negative bitches) cause you both are a waste of my positive energy.
[/quote]Having servers before, or for some length of time doesn’t mean you’re competent enough to run one… It merely means you can successfully download something and run it.

The reason I’ve never run my own server is not because I’m incapable, it’s because I choose not to.

Also, what kind of delusion are you living in that I need to come out with a server to understand what skills someone needs to run and maintain a server? In case you haven’t noticed, I’m one of the project ‘leaders’ and biggest contributer for MoparClassic, which is a server that you can’t even figure out how to get working properly.

Furthermore, your reasoning for why I post is completely wrong. I posted, in this thread, because you shouldn’t be running a server; it’s unethical for someone as incompetent as you to run one.

Anyway, why don’t you address the point I made, rather than personally attacking me and using logical fallacies.

That is doing real well btw.
[/quote]What? You going to need to be more specific… You’ve quoted a relatively large post with many points, and made a comment that has absolutely no hint as to what you’re referencing.[/quote]

Shut the fuck up fame, all you’ve done here is negatively reflect anyone who has anything to do with running a private rsc server project. Your own lack of self esteem towards someone who is trying to help everyone else out, if they’re looking for a server similar to something of this nature, is reflected poorly upon you if someone smart were to take the time to realize. If you think their passwords are susceptible to hacking then maybe warning them of the instance, instead of flaming the OP server admin, would probably be the more mature course of action. Anyone even considering this server has a lack of what this man has to offer them. You might go far some day if you notice your own ignorance in the course of your accusations. Just be aware, for future reference, you might be able to code a server of a dying game, you might even be able to brag about it to everyone who has no idea, but in the end you’re still just a nobody talking about nothing anyone cares about so much to even quote you at the dinner table to themselves.

On Topic: I think this idea has been stretched out a thousand times, by people more capable than yourself, Matt. Maybe by condensing your own skill set with others and to maybe sacrifice more than you’re willing to do so, you can probably find a solution to “our” dying rsc private server situation. Not to say that you aren’t trying, but i think it’s going to take more than what you’re offering as a supplementary solution to the needs of the few who actually give a fuck.

Good luck tho.

Read full topic

item.title: Delete all of this please and thank you
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“matty matt, post:14, topic:524495”][quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=643045.msg4330067#msg4330067 date=1373516097]

With the amount of help topics you’ve posted, no thanks.

I think we will see a new topic in the near future entitled “Help there’s a dupe on my server NEED HELP ASAP.”

to counter what you are saying i’ve been around for at least a few years. when it comes out try it, don’t judge me by what you see thanks.
[/quote]What do you suggest we judge you by then?

I don’t want to be judged I would just like to put a server out to have FUN as no one else has a server out. I would like to keep classic alive as no one else has put a server out to TRY.[/quote]Well unfortunately for you, people are going to judge you whether you want them to or not.

Read full topic

item.title: Delete all of this please and thank you
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:23, topic:524495”][quote author=matty matt link=topic=643045.msg4330329#msg4330329 date=1373565210]

With the amount of help topics you’ve posted, no thanks.

I think we will see a new topic in the near future entitled “Help there’s a dupe on my server NEED HELP ASAP.”

to counter what you are saying i’ve been around for at least a few years. when it comes out try it, don’t judge me by what you see thanks.

More like a year.

yeah maybe under this account name, since we are bring specific my other account has been registered for 2 year not 3 sorry.[quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=643045.msg4330270#msg4330270 date=1373559479]

I have nothing against people learning. But sorry, I don’t think someone that inexperienced should try to run a server. CFF already posted enough reasons why

Frankly, you have no authority to be judging others.
[/quote]
Agreed.

It is ok for the people that are judgmental to not try the server out, just don’t come on topic to bash or put people down for no reason at all… you can sit there and say oh i just wanna let people know what they are dealing with, but in reality it is just alibis to your being a negative nuisance.
[/quote]What is your other account?

Also, people have the right to know that the owner of a server is incompetent to the point that he is incapable of securing their passwords.[/quote]
hey Can you read i said i was done talking to your negative nancy ass, you are just as bad as the other guy. [quote=“ZeIdar, post:18, topic:524495”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=643045.msg4330004#msg4330004 date=1373506693]

[quote author=ccs29v link=topic=643045.msg4329996#msg4329996 date=1373505679]
Yea. We need to learn if we don’t know how to do so, at least he is trying. Don’t be too mean,dude. Give him a chance, and let’s us see his ser
[/quote]He can’t even do the most basic things imaginable, how can you expect him to fix a bug, add new content, or even secure his player’s passwords?
[/quote][/quote]
this is coming from a first time poster hmm wonder who he is??? but i can say that when I’ve had my other servers up i never had a problem with anyone’s password being compromised or any accounts stolen. As far as bugs I fixed most the bugs that came up while they were running, also i added several updates, fixes and new areas(different from real RSC). thanks for the concern, i’ll try my best.
